description: Saotome Ranzou is Alto`s father and the 18th souke of the Saotome family. A very strict man, he has trained his son harshly in the art of kabuki since youth which has resulted in their current estranged relationship. However, after a close brush with death, Ranzou is willing to make amends with Alto and officially name him successor to the Saotome family.
name: Saotome Ranzou
